item.description:
This is a road trip and an opportunity to step for the entire weekend with
GOOD DEEDS INTERNATIONAL (GDI), LLC (friends of TOSOB).


GOOD DEEDS INTERNATIONAL (GDI), LLC
Presents the 4th Annual
"HERITAGE BALL - 2011"
Weekend Extravaganza!
“Celebrating Our Heritage – In Commemoration of
Black History Month”
February 17-20, 2011 ° ATLANTA, GEORGIA


For all the details regarding itinerary, pricing, purchasing and locations goto;

www.gooddeedsinternational.com

The Original Steppers of Boston will be there... Will You?

(information is subject to change, please confirm with www.gooddeedsinternational.com. This is not a TOSOB event. Posted with permissions of GDI)

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: "HERITAGE BALL - 2011" Weekend Extravaganza! - Atlanta
